title: ISic001680. I.Sicily inscription 001680
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΟΔΑΜΟΣΤΩΝΕΓΕΣΤΑΙΩΝ
2ΦΑΩΝΑΝΥΜΦΩΝΟΣΣΩΠΟΛΙΑΝΟΝ
3ΑΡΕΤΑΣΕΝΕΚΑ

Apparatus criticus

Text of I.Segesta

English translation

The people of the Segestans (dedicate this statue of) Phaon Sopolianos, son of Nymphon, on account of his excellence

Italian translation

Il popolo dei Segestani (ha onorato/ha eretto la statua di) Phaon, figlio di Nymphon, Sopolianos, per il suo valore[transl. from I.Segesta]

commentary

bibliography

  • Ampolo and Erdas 2019 G4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001036
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence

3ΑΡΕΤΑΣΕΝΕΚΑ

English translation

The people of the Segestans (dedicate this statue of) Phaon Sopolianos, son of Nymphon, on account of his excellence

Italian translation

Il popolo dei Segestani (ha onorato/ha eretto la statua di) Phaon, figlio di Nymphon, Sopolianos, per il suo valore[transl. from I.Segesta]
